text:
Hi Everyone :wave:
• My name is Walter and I'm from Ireland. I have 2+ years working in digital marketing and I'm looking to land a fully remote role where I can grow professionally. 
• I'm currently working 2 part-time roles with a mindfulness startup called <http://MindOwl.org|MindOwl.org> and small marketing agency. I'd be delighted to chat with fellow marketers, especially those that specialise in copy, content and email marketing. 
• I also just moved to Barcelona to improve my Spanish and to get out of the Irish countryside for a while, feel free to give me a shout if you're nearby!
Thanks for reading and feeel free to connect with me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/walter-cullinan/|Linkedin>
Cheers!

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?

:wave: *If you’re a content marketer, you may know me from my Copyblogger days.*

I have written well over 100 posts on the site. I was hired as their Executive Vice President of Educational Content and managed the Copyblogger editorial team. I wrote a book, _Master Content Marketing,_ while employed there.

But actually? That’s only a tiny slice of my career story. I’m celebrating 30 years in business for myself this year. :tada:

These days, I devote myself to helping people in mid-career build profitable online offers that generate $10-20k/month in revenue. It’s a tall order, but I have a pretty cool process that coaches them through it.

Content marketing is a HUGE part of my strategy for getting the word out about how I serve people. I have a growing YouTube channel and embed those videos in written content on my own site. I look for good-fit podcasts and other YouTube channels where I make guest appearances.

*Content marketing changed my life, and I’ll be forever grateful.*

So glad to be a part of this community. How can I help YOU?

while employed there.

But actually? That’s only a tiny slice of my career story. I’m celebrating 30 years in business for myself this year.

These days, I devote myself to helping people in mid-career build profitable online offers that generate $10-20k/month in revenue. It’s a tall order, but I have a pretty cool process that coaches them through it.

Content marketing is a HUGE part of my strategy for getting the word out about how I serve people. I have a growing YouTube channel and embed those videos in written content on my own site. I look for good-fit podcasts and other YouTube channels where I make guest appearances.
Content marketing changed my life, and I’ll be forever grateful.
So glad to be a part of this community. How can I help YOU?

text:
Hello, everyone! Great to be here.

Experienced copy/content writer and aspiring content marketer here!

I began writing content right after my A Levels, and I've turned it into a full-time career. I used to write for many different personas, but eventually niched down and now focus on two key audiences: digital agencies and ecommerce.

Currently, I work with several freelance clients,  and I'm looking for more opportunities. I have an established portfolio, but I'm always on the lookout for more opportunities!

Connect with me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/najam-ahmed/|LinkedIn>.

text:
Hey all! I joined about a month ago but really haven't done anything until now - glad to be here, if a little late!
I'm Janet, a graphic designer slowly trying to transition to UI/UX. I've been working FT as a graphic designer, but recently shifted my <https://www.behance.net/tenaj|business> to freelance. And it made a world of difference!
Have absolutely loved all the discussions and materials on this Superpath Slack so far.
Again, I'm excited to be here and connect with you all!

Just joined after seeing a Tweet mention the community earlier today. I’m a  content marketing consultancy founder (<https://www.erikaheald.com/>), frequent conference speaker, and lead the weekly #ContentChat Twitter chat on Mondays at noon Pacific. Nice to meet you all!

text:
Hi there!
Excited to connect with you! I've run a content agency since 2005, used to run a course teaching people how to start freelancing, and currently serve as Editorial Director at <http://Capitalism.com|Capitalism.com>. But... now that the agency is in excellent hands (thank goodness for Jessica - everyone needs a Jessica!), I'm elbow deep in my new venture, starting an entrepreneur retreat center in the Smoky Mountains of Tennessee.
Great to meet you all, and if I can help you with anything (especially if you're veering off into ecomm), hit me up!

Greetings! I’m a content writer and editor who’s looking to sharpen my content marketing chops and build my client base. I’m also interested in a FT position. I’ve got experience in journalism, marketing, and advertising. I do short- and long-form content, specialize in features and profiles, have a knack for voice, and can tell you waaaay more about board games than you might want to know.
<http://www.ericjfrancis.com|www.ericjfrancis.com>

text: Hey everyone :wave:. I’m Aaricka (pronounced like Erica. Yes, it’s quite fun ordering lattes at Starbucks).  I’m based in Los Angeles. I’m a former middle school teacher (yes, I have A LOT of patience) and a current <https://www.aarickawashington.com|freelance journalist>. I’m shifting gears into the TECH field w/ my transferable skills, talents and passions. I’m currently looking into positions like content marketing, copywriting, project management and other careers. I LOVE being enterprising, creative and enthusiastic in whatever I do :yellow_heart:.  I’m a HUGE networker and community-driven person. I would love to work at Twitter, Netflix or any of the FAANG companies (or any other company I’m missing out on). Do you know of any great organizations or positions I should be on the lookout for? I look forward to networking with you all.

attachments.text: I am a multimedia reporter based in New York City.

text:
Hello! I’m Jared. 

I used to be a VP of Sales and Loan Officer at a hard money lending company but left a month ago because it was a toxic environment and my mental health was in the gutter. Health > Loans!

I just started my career as a freelance writer this week and am looking for writing opportunities. I expect to focus on finance and real estate since I am most knowledgeable on those topics. 

Glad to be a part of this group and learn from you all!

Twitter: <https://twitter.com/jarednewman44>
LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/jared-newman-70591051/>

attachments.text: The latest Tweets from Jared Newman (@jarednewman44). Current Writer and Freelancer Former VP of Sales and Loan Officer. San Diego, CA

text:
Hey everyone, I’m Matthew Guay (and go by both Matthew and Matt), originally from the States but based in Bangkok. I was an early member of Zapier’s editorial team (and crossed paths with <@UJG9WTEKG> there) as senior writer/editor, and more recently helped found the <http://Capiche.com|Capiche.com> software community. Now I’m building a new startup, Reproof, building a new tool for writers that we hope to launch mid-year.

Twitter: <https://twitter.com/maguay>
Blog + new startup: <https://reproof.app/>

text:
Hi everyone! Excited to connect with everyone and be part of this community. I'm the Product Marketing Manager at Silverfort. I have been in the cybersecurity field for the past 7 years working in content-driven positions. I previously worked at SCADAfence, Perimeter 81 and WhiteSource. I'm originally from Seattle but now based in Tel Aviv Israel. Nice to meet you all and looking forward to learning from all of you.

Looking forward to connecting on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/zevbrodsky/|LinkedIn> & <https://twitter.com/ZevBrodsky|Twitter>
